title: Arena Exercise
snippet:
Business Process Simulation – Discrete Event Simulation and Queueing Theory

The assignment contains two parts: 
1.	Project description, which formulates a mini-project
2.	Project report, which documents the mini-project work and results
Project description should be 1-2 pages long, clearly introducing (fictive data):
•	Company description
•	Production/service description
•	Problem statement
•	Project scope and objectives
The problem should be at a proper complexity level, in principle like the supply chain exercise included below; on top of it, practical implications should be considered. 
Project report should be 8-15 pages long and include the following:
•	Document the work following ‘the lifecycle of a simulation project’
•	Develop some performance measurements if necessary
•	Describe the data collection and analysis
•	Contain a AS-IS process map and solution (to-be) map 
•	Contain a sensitivity analysis if possible
•	Explain why Queueing Theory can or cannot be applied


I cannot upload the document here, so I copy & pasted the requirements. You will probably need the whole document to understand the full picture. I will also provide you with the Sample Data.


PS: This should be a very easy project for you. We're students in our first year, so you can imagine the complexity of this project is quite low. A long-term employment might be possible here
